name: Finding Fomo - Wholesome Game Jam 2022
description:
Finding Fomo is a game about helping find a neighborhood cat. It involves drawing, platforming, and dialoging.

  • Aidan Waite: Programming
  • Carlo Arcovio: Programming
  • David Han: Design & Writing
  • FromTheFenn: Art
  • Jennifer Pryde: Music
  • Dice image by Andrew Doane
  • Github

Thank you!
